title: "Off the Menu: Restaurants tap into artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "ChatGPT is, of course, an artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot that its developers, San Francisco-based Open AI, claim can have human-like conversations with users. Built on the latest technology in language processing, ChatGPT supposedly “learns” from human interaction, making itself able to better respond when engaged by a human user."
